name: Darn Tough Kelso Light Cushion Micro Crew Socks - Men's
categories: Kelso Light Cushion Micro Crew Socks
description: Lightly cushioned socks for light hikes or light yard work. Made of a naturally antimicrobial merino wool blend that stands up to multi-day wears between washes.Made of a merino wool blend to keep you warm in the cold and cool when it's hot.Lightly cushioned sole provide great comfort without bulk.Lightweight wool yarn in a ribbed performance knit with seamless construction ensures no slipping, no bunching and no blisters.Darn Tough sources their wool from non-mulesed sheep.
